title: lets.trade
author: lets.trade
created_time: July 02, 2023, 01:48:52 PMLast edit: July 04, 2023, 12:22:07 PM by lets.trade
content: Hello Bitcointalk communityWe're thrilled to present Dex Machina, a new project that will change trading by using advanced AI technologies.   What is Dex Machina?Dex Machina is a project that will use artificial intelligence to improve trading. Our platform will give precise trading signals and strategies, helping users make smart decisions and get the most out of their trades.  AI FeaturesOur AI system will be trained on a vast amount of data and will use machine learning algorithms to predict market trends and generate trading signals. The AI will be integrated with a Telegram Bot, allowing users to receive timely trading signals directly through the popular messaging app.   RoadmapOur roadmap is a testament to our commitment to continuous improvement and innovation. Here are some key milestones:Q3 2023: Launch DEXAI token and provide initial liquidity  Q4 2023: Develop and train the initial version of our AI trading algorithm  Q1 2024: Integrate AI with Telegram Bot and launch beta testing for DEXAI holders  Q2 2024: Refine AI based on user feedback and expand trading strategies and algorithms  Q4 2024: Launch public version of AI trading platform with DEXAI token integration  Qx 2025 and beyond: Continuously improve AI, and develop new features based on community input  Migration to ERC-20In the future, we're planning to migrate to the ERC-20 standard. All holders of the BEP-20 token will receive an equivalent amount in the ERC-20 network after the migration. Stay tuned for more updates on this.OTC ApplicationsWe will be accepting OTC applications. If you're interested, please contact us via Telegram: https://t.me/ai_lets_tradeJoin UsWe invite you to join us on this exciting journey. Stay tuned for more updates and feel free to ask any questions you may have about our project.   If you have experience with AI development and big data, we're always open to hearing your ideas and criticisms. Also, feel free to contact us if you're interested in participating in the project. You can reach us via Telegram: https://t.me/ai_lets_tradeFor more information, please visit our website: https://lets.trade/Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/lets_trade_aiJoin our Telegram group and channel: https://t.me/lets_trade_aihttps://t.me/lets_rekt
